document.full_text: voters in one of the most populous counties in the united states went to the polls on tuesday for a recall vote spearheaded by a billionaire anti-tax crusader and aimed at toppling a once-popular republican mayor.
document.title: miami area mayor faces ouster in recall vote
lines_and_colors: voters in one of the most populous counties in the united states went to the polls on tuesday for a recall vote spearheaded by a billionaire anti-tax crusader and aimed at toppling a once-popular republican mayor.
